name: disjimxrn

body.origin:
|- wi(wdisjALTV(c0), wdisjALTV(cxrn(c1, c0)))
-| wi(wo(wdisjALTV(c1), wdisjALTV(c0)), wdisjALTV(cxrn(c1, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wdisjALTV(c0), wdisjALTV(cxrn(c1, c0)))
-| wi(wo(wdisjALTV(c1), wdisjALTV(c0)), wdisjALTV(cxrn(c1, c0)))

comment: Disjointness condition for range Cartesian product. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 15-Dec-2020.) (Revised by Peter Mazsa, 22-Sep-2021.)
